other_title: Boku no Kanojo ga Majime Sugiru Shobitch na Ken (Japanese)
My Girlfriend Is Too Much To Handle
僕の彼女がマジメ過ぎるしょびっちな件 (Japanese)
plot: With nothing left to lose, ordinary high school student Haruka Shinozaki confesses to beautiful, diligent class representative Akiho Kōsaka and to his surprise she accepts. Kōsaka takes dating as seriously as she does everything else, but does not quite get it. She pragmatically suggests activities that are too sexual. (from manga)
ending_theme: "Ai no Himitsu" (The Secret of Love) by pua:re
